```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)

## read in model
m = read_rds("../Models/bm_fire.rds")

## get median conditions of each fire
d = m$data
d2 = m$data2

filter(d, fire_na %in% c('ZOGG', 'CZU LIGHTNING COMPLEX', 
                         'AUGUST COMPLEX FIRES', 'NORTH COMPLEX')) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = factor(rdnbr_h), y = fm1000)) +
  facet_grid(cols = vars(fire_na)) +
  geom_boxplot()

group_by(d2, fire_na) %>% 
  summarise(mn = mean(fm1000)) %>% 
  arrange(mn)
```
